markdownRemark.html:
• Talking the language - What data scientist say and "normal people" ain't the same. plus every one is faking it. But are they making it.
  • Data is not correct. How do you mitigate?
  • There is more than one way to do it and SQL Python R may not be the right way. How do you chose?
  • Data science is not the same as software engineering. Data science is about quick answers not elegant answers. Your initial code will never make it to production.

frontmatter.title: Everything is hammer in data science
Raspberry pico tetris using st7735 and micro python
